subject: Simsonn GT2 Racing Simulator Steering Wheel S1
description_text:
Hello,

Wanted to ask you if the Simsonn GT2 steering wheel QR works with a MOZA R9
V2 base.

Thank you!

conversations.body_text: Hi Juan Manuel Peric,  Our steering wheel supports a 70mm bolt pattern quick release. If you want to connect it to a quick release with a different bolt pattern, you may need an adapter.Â
